channel.title: 2023 on 点滴随记
channel.description: Recent content in 2023 on 点滴随记

item.title: Equipment Losses During The 2022 Ruzzian Invasion Of Ukraine
item.description:
From:
● Attack On Europe: Documenting Equipment Losses During The 2022 Russian Invasion Of Ukraine
● Attack On Europe: Documenting Ukrainian Equipment Losses During The 2022 Russian Invasion Of Ukraine
Note: Equipment what Ukraine captured from Ruzzian are more than they lost
Ψ Time: Google “ukraine time”

2022年度总结:


Recording Time Russia Lost Ukraine Lost
18:43
2022年11月10日（星期四） (GMT+2)
乌克兰的时间

11 Nov, Russia announces withdrawal from Kherson		 7717, of which: destroyed: 4731, damaged: 184, abandoned: 296, captured: 2506
Tanks (1460, of which destroyed: 841, damaged: 62, abandoned: 54, captured: 503)		 2200, of which: destroyed: 1280, damaged: 83, abandoned: 67, captured: 770
